title: Universe/Frames/AxesOrient
description: Configuration for AxesOrient axes in frames plugin

nutation.description: Optional nutation IPF file path (only for IERS2000 models)

erp.description: Optional Earth Rotation Parameters IPF file path (only for IERS2000 models)

h.description: Optional Grid Spacing to compute numerical derivatives (only for IAUOrient models)

epoch.description: Optional epoch for frozen frames (only for IERS2000Frozen models)

preCorrection.description: Pre-transformation orientation correction vector (three angles in radians)

postCorrection.description: Post-transformation orientation correction vector (three angles in radians)
